entry.title: GAME in NARRATIVE IMPROV
entry.content:
Bring more comedy into your improvised stories by learning how to find and play funny patterns and endow your characters with comedic points of view!

We all love narrative improv! We take the audience on a journey and leave them feeling satisfied, knowing what’s happened to the wonderful characters we’ve...

entry.title: The XxX's
entry.content:
Stories about love and the end of it, inspired by expartners from the audience.

This show on January 20th specifically will be an experimental alternative proposal as you have never seen improv before. Not on a stage but very close to the improvisers walking as spectators through different rooms. A...

entry.title: The XxX's + musical @ Dynamo
entry.content:
A double feature show:

  • “Don’t Touch My Mushroom” will be playing an improvised show about love and breakup called “The XxX’s”.

  • “Basic Pitches” will be playing an improvised musical.

entry.title: The Stranger
entry.content:
Watch the Mushrooms at improvise at Theater Ida with a new long form improvised: The Stranger.

Meet a tight knit community facing a mysterious challenge when a stranger arrives. Who are those people? What is their secret? Who is that stranger for goodness sake? We all do not...

entry.title: Improv Earthquake
entry.content: Improv Earthquake! Cheer for your improviser to help them crush the opposition. Will your tectonic plate have the upper hand?

entry.title: Double feature
entry.content: In this very special double feature, we present two unique improv shows in one fantastic night. First, Don’t Touch My Mushroom Improv will play their new improvised format “The Gathering” for the first time ever. It’s a show about a dramatic, life changing event, gathering friends and enemies, envious...

entry.title: Ida Theatersport Liga
entry.content:
Theater Ida is organizing a theater sports liga with shows in English.

Theater Ida presents the Ida Theatersport Liga. 2 teams will compete with the weapons of improvisation theatre. The audience and jury decide and award the points. It will be tough, it will be exciting, it will...

entry.title: Theater Sports by ZIC: DTMM VS ZIC
entry.content:
Zurich Improv Comedy (ZIC) is organizing a theater sports show and they invited us to participate.

The home team, Zurich Improv Comedy (ZIC), competes in each show against a different improv group from Switzerland. The two teams improvise scenes based on audience suggestions. It is also the...

entry.title: a penny for my thoughts
entry.content:
An improvised play based on a game where characters will try to recover their lost memories.

We will ask the audience to come up with “memory triggers” to help our “patients” throughout their journey.

The first half of the show will be short form improv games that you...
